name: prosper

(of a person or a business) to be or become successful, especially financially: Lots of microchip manufacturing companies prospered at that time. Synonyms
flourish
thrive
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to achieve something aimed forsucceedIf you work hard, you'll succeed.thriveUniversity is a place where she will thrive.flourishHe tried journalism, but flourished as a novelist. triumphThe Labour Party triumphed in the election.bring something offShe's one of the few singers who can bring off such a difficult piece of music.
